Classes/RVS_Base_PersistentPrefs.html#/s.name: key
Classes/RVS_Base_PersistentPrefs.html#/s.abstract: This is the key that is used to store and fetch the collection of data to be used to populate the _values Dictionary.

Classes/RVS_Base_PersistentPrefs.html#/s.name: keys
Classes/RVS_Base_PersistentPrefs.html#/s.abstract: This calculated property MUST be overridden by subclasses.

Classes/RVS_Base_PersistentPrefs.html#/s.name: values
Classes/RVS_Base_PersistentPrefs.html#/s.abstract: This is an accessor for the _values Dictionary. Before it returns the Dictionary, it loads data from persistent storage.

Classes/RVS_Base_PersistentPrefs.html#/c.name: init()
Classes/RVS_Base_PersistentPrefs.html#/c.abstract: The default initializer uses the current subclass typename as the main key.

Classes/RVS_Base_PersistentPrefs.html#/s.name: init(key:values:)
Classes/RVS_Base_PersistentPrefs.html#/s.abstract: You can initialize instances with a key and some initial data values.

Classes/RVS_Base_PersistentPrefs.html.name: RVS_Base_PersistentPrefs
Classes/RVS_Base_PersistentPrefs.html.abstract: This class is designed to act as an abstract base class, providing a simple Dictionary datastore.
